dustStorm: ^A pretty big dust storm is kicking up ahead, what's the plan?
takeCoverSuccess: ^You stop the van outside an abandoned joint and everyone shelters inside successfully. You even find an untouched food kit wedged inside a cabinet for the taking.
takeCoverFail: ^You get blasted with dust so bad that you get bowled over. You have to scramble to drag yourself out, though you at least manage to successfully take cover afterwards.
driveThroughSuccess: ^Long live the vainglorious! You charge into the dust storm without giving a shit whether your wheels are still making contact with the asphalt below. If you die, you die—and your van comes out the other end relatively unscathed!
driveThroughFail: ^Somehow, you aren’t the only one crazy enough to try driving through this dust storm…
